perturbation.original_text: Terms of payment will be 1/3 upon  placement  of order and 2/3  balance  net thirty (30) days  or as  mutually  agreed  upon in  writing  between  the  parties.
perturbation.changed_text: Terms of payment will be 1/3 upon placement of order and 2/3 balance net sixty (60) days. No other payment terms shall be valid.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction regarding payment deadlines. The original text states 'net thirty (30) days or as mutually agreed upon in writing'. The modified text changes the payment term to 'net sixty (60) days' and removes the clause about mutual agreement, creating an inconsistency that could lead to disputes about the agreed payment terms.

perturbation.original_text: The  term of this  Agreement  shall  be two (2)  years  from the Effective  Date with  automatic  annual  renewals  thereafter  provided either  party does not provide  sixty (60) days  notice of  termination prior to the renewal date or the Agreement is not otherwise  terminated as set forth in Section 8.
perturbation.changed_text: The  term of this  Agreement  shall  be two (2)  years  from the Effective  Date with  automatic  annual  renewals  thereafter  provided either  party does not provide  thirty (30) days  notice of  termination prior to the renewal date or the Agreement is not otherwise  terminated as set forth in Section 8.
perturbation.explanation: This changes the notice period for termination from 60 days to 30 days. This directly contradicts the original clause and introduces uncertainty as to the correct notice period required for terminating the agreement.

perturbation.original_text: SIERRA warrants that it carries  general  liability  insurance of not less than $2 million  per occurrence and product liability insurance of not less than $5 million  per occurrence  and that,  upon the execution of this Agreement,  it  will name ENVISION as an additional  insured on such policies.
perturbation.changed_text: SIERRA warrants that it carries general liability insurance of not less than $1 million per occurrence and product liability insurance of not less than $3 million per occurrence and that, upon the execution of this Agreement, it will name ENVISION as an additional insured on such policies.
perturbation.explanation: This change reduces the required insurance coverage amounts that SIERRA warrants it carries. This is a direct contradiction, as the clause now specifies lower coverage amounts than originally stated. This inconsistency creates confusion and potential disputes regarding the required insurance coverage.
